commands.name: az monitor action-group test-notifications create
commands.syntax:
az monitor action-group test-notifications create --action-group
                                                  --alert-type
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  [--add-action]
                                                  [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
examples: az monitor action-group test-notifications create --action-group MyActionGroup --resource-group MyResourceGroup -a email alice alice@example.com usecommonalertsChema --alert-type budget
